text: Hagi Josaia'ma kinima manino Juda vahe'ma kegavama hu'nea knafina, Ra Anumzamo'a amanage huno nasami'ne. Nagri'ma natre'naza Israeli vahe'mo'zama hu'naza avu'ava zana kenampi? Nevente'ma mani fatgo osu a'mo'ma hiaza hu'za maka agonaramimpine, ranra zafaramimofo agafafinena vu'za monko a'nemo'za nehazaza hu'za havi anumzantera monora ome hunte'za vano hu'naze.
